name: Paints, Varnishes, and Supplies
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Wholesale distributors of paints, varnishes, wallpaper, and supplies.
The product line of such merchants may include colors and pigments,
enamels, lacquers, paint brushes, paint pans, sandpaper, drop cloths,
shellac, rollers, and sprayers.
For retailers that sell these items, use MCC 5231.
